channel.title: Theiving Stalls Dc's players when they theiv it. I Will [rep++]!

item.title: Theiving Stalls Dc's players when they theiv it. I Will [rep++]!
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

[quote=“mod cody, post:2, topic:352378”]ROFL!!!
this is soooo funny but ima help you xDxDxD

im dying here let me explain

in this line of the code

 if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq)

male the part ‘= lvlReq)’ the level required to do this action

if(playerLevel[17] >= 15)  //This makes it so to do this action you need lvl 15 requirement.

in this line

   setAnimation(emote);

where it says ‘(emote)’ put the emote ID …
ex.

setAnimation("55");

For this part of the code

   sM(message);

where it says ‘(message)’ put it in quotes the “message”
ex.

 sM("this is the message!");

For this part of the code

   addItem(item, itemAmount);

Where it says ‘(item, itemAmount)’ make it the ITEM # and the # of that item
ex. – If you want 50k gold ( item id 0995 )

addItem(0995, 50000); // I dont think their is quotes in this one. Their might be.

And in this part of the code

   addSkillXP(XPamount, 17);

In the ‘(XPamount, 17)’, make the XPamount instead of saying that make them numbers for the amount of exp you want to give them per stall click.
ex.

addSkillXP(300, 17);   // this will give skill #17 300 exp

Anymore questions add me on msn
bakerisbeter@silentpkz.com

Rep++[/quote]You are like the dumbest person I’ve ever encountered in my entire life.

I hope to god you’re just trolling because hit single post actually lowered my respect for moparscape by an exponential amount.

Trxkin, if you can’t program go grab a book and learn. There’s no need in half-assing it like everyone else here.

Read full topic

item.title: Theiving Stalls Dc's players when they theiv it. I Will [rep++]!
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“Trxkin, post:5, topic:352378”]Alright, i did it and this error comes up on compiler.

[quote]./client.java:4563: integer number too large: 0995
addItem(0995, 50000):
^
1 error
Press any key to continue. . .[/quote]

and this is my theifstall method…

[quote]public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) {
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return;
if(playerLevel[17] >= 15) {
actionInterval = 4000;
lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
setAnimation(“55”);
sM(“You take from the stall…”);
sM(“message”);
addItem(0995, 50000);
addSkillXP(300, 17);
}
else if(playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) {
sM(“You need a theiving level of “+lvlReq+” to theif from this stall.”);
}
}[/quote][/quote]
remove the 0 in front of the 995 then compile again.

Read full topic

item.title: Theiving Stalls Dc's players when they theiv it. I Will [rep++]!
item.dc:creator: @Trxkin Trxkin
item.description:
@Trxkin wrote:

Alright, i did it and this error comes up on compiler.

./client.java:4563: integer number too large: 0995 addItem(0995, 50000): ^ 1 error Press any key to continue. . .

and this is my theifstall method…

public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) { if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return; if(playerLevel[17] >= 15) { actionInterval = 4000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); setAnimation("55"); sM("You take from the stall.."); sM("message"); addItem(0995, 50000); addSkillXP(300, 17); } else if(playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) { sM("You need a theiving level of "+lvlReq+" to theif from this stall."); } }

item.description:
@John459 wrote:

[quote=“mod cody, post:2, topic:352378”]ROFL!!!
this is soooo funny but ima help you xDxDxD

im dying here let me explain

in this line of the code

 if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq)

male the part ‘= lvlReq)’ the level required to do this action

if(playerLevel[17] >= 15)  //This makes it so to do this action you need lvl 15 requirement.

in this line

   setAnimation(emote);

where it says ‘(emote)’ put the emote ID …
ex.

setAnimation("55");

For this part of the code

   sM(message);

where it says ‘(message)’ put it in quotes the “message”
ex.

 sM("this is the message!");

For this part of the code

   addItem(item, itemAmount);

Where it says ‘(item, itemAmount)’ make it the ITEM # and the # of that item
ex. – If you want 50k gold ( item id 0995 )

addItem(0995, 50000); // I dont think their is quotes in this one. Their might be.

And in this part of the code

   addSkillXP(XPamount, 17);

In the ‘(XPamount, 17)’, make the XPamount instead of saying that make them numbers for the amount of exp you want to give them per stall click.
ex.

addSkillXP(300, 17);   // this will give skill #17 300 exp

Anymore questions add me on msn
bakerisbeter@silentpkz.com

Rep++[/quote]

You are the stupidest person I’ve ever seen.

Why?

Re-read the block of code he posted and you will see why.

item.title: Theiving Stalls Dc's players when they theiv it. I Will [rep++]!
item.dc:creator: @Trxkin Trxkin
item.description:
@Trxkin wrote:

OK, this is my third post and no-once has helped me. OK, i’m trying to fix my stall’s, so when a player theiv’s a stall they don’t DC from my server. So, what i’m saying is. When a play tried to theiv from a stall, it freezes them. Then they log off. Here is my theifStall method. If someone can please help me i would thank you alot. Ill [rep++]. THANKS!

public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) { if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return; if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) { actionInterval = 4000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); setAnimation(emote); sM("You take from the stall.."); sM(message); addItem(item, itemAmount); addSkillXP(XPamount, 17); } else if(playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) { sM("You need a theiving level of "+lvlReq+" to theif from this stall."); } }

I don’t know if i have to change what. But i need help ASAP please.

Read full topic
